item.tcc.soldier_basic_tag.desc: A symbol of basic combat skills, providing enhanced base damage
item.tcc.soldier_specific_tag.desc: A symbol of specific combat skills, providing enhanced specific damage
item.tcc.heavy_caliber_tag.desc: Enhanced damage for rifles, sniper rifles, SMGs, LMGs, and launchers
item.tcc.heavy_caliber_tag.effect: Provides %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher damage bonus, reduces accuracy by %2$s%%
item.tcc.red_movement_tag.desc: Perfect combination of fast movement and precise shooting
item.tcc.ural_wolf_tag.desc: Accurate and deadly strike, showing the instinct of a hunter
item.tcc.heaven_fire_judgment.desc: I will launch an awesome attack
item.tcc.heaven_fire_judgment.effect: When player's HP is above 40%, increases %1$s%% general gun damage. After dealing damage, immediately deducts %2$s%% current HP, then consumes %3$s%% maximum HP per second for %4$s seconds. When player's HP is below 40%, all effects of this curio are disabled
item.tcc.heaven_fire_apocalypse.effect: When player's HP is at 100%, increases %1$s%% general gun damage, +%2$s explosion radius, increases %3$s%% explosion damage. After dealing damage, deducts %4$s%% current HP, and provides %5$s%% general gun damage bonus to players within %6$s blocks for %7$s seconds
item.tcc.magazine_boost.effect: Increases %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher reload speed
item.tcc.corrupt_magazine.desc: Magazine with larger capacity but slower reloading
item.tcc.corrupt_magazine.effect: Increases %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher magazine capacity, reduces reload speed by %2$s%%
item.tcc.split_chamber.desc: Technology that splits a single bullet into multiple bullets
item.tcc.split_chamber.effect: Increases %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher bullet count
item.tcc.despicable_acceleration.desc: Extreme shooting speed at the cost of reducing general damage
item.tcc.despicable_acceleration.effect: Increases %1$s%% fire rate, reduces %2$s%% general damage and all rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, launcher, pistol, and shotgun damage
item.tcc.merged_rifling.desc: Comprehensive enhancement solution integrating multiple rifling technologies
item.tcc.merged_rifling.effect: Increases %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher damage and %2$s%% gun movement speed. Cannot be equipped with Rifling simultaneously
item.tcc.alloy_drill.desc: Made of special alloy with extremely strong penetration ability
item.tcc.careful_heart.effect: Increases %1$s%% launcher damage bonus, %2$s%% explosion damage bonus, %3$s%% explosion radius bonus
item.tcc.blaze_storm.desc: Master the power of explosion, turning the battlefield into a hellfire
item.tcc.blaze_storm.effect: Increases %1$s%% explosion radius, increases %2$s%% explosion damage. Cannot be equipped with Blaze Storm Prime simultaneously
item.tcc.blaze_storm_prime.desc: Ultimate explosive control ability, the flame king on the battlefield
item.tcc.blaze_storm_prime.effect: Increases %1$s%% explosion radius, increases %2$s%% explosion damage. Cannot be equipped with Blaze Storm simultaneously
item.tcc.ripping_prime.desc: Ultimate shooting speed combined with powerful penetration ability
item.tcc.evil_accuracy.desc: Ultimate control, reducing recoil while sacrificing fire rate
item.tcc.limit_speed.desc: Let bullets fly at extreme speed
item.tcc.ferocious_extension.desc: Let bullets fly farther to strike distant enemies
item.tcc.rifling.desc: Rifling technology that enhances specific gun damage
item.tcc.rifling.effect: Increases %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher damage. Cannot be equipped with Merged Rifling simultaneously
item.tcc.heavy_firepower.desc: Enhance pistol firepower, but affect accuracy
item.tcc.heavy_firepower.effect: Increases %1$s%% pistol damage, reduces accuracy by %2$s%%
item.tcc.wasp_stinger.desc: Special curio that enhances pistol damage
item.tcc.prophecy_pact.desc: Mysterious pact that enhances pistol damage
item.tcc.malignant_spread.desc: Enhance shotgun firepower, but affect accuracy
item.tcc.malignant_spread.effect: Increases %1$s%% shotgun damage, reduces accuracy by %2$s%%
item.tcc.chamber.desc: Enhance sniper rifle damage only when magazine is full
item.tcc.chamber.effect: Increases %1$s%% damage when using a full magazine sniper rifle. Cannot be equipped with Chamber Prime simultaneously
item.tcc.chamber_prime.desc: Ultimate enhancement for sniper rifle damage only when magazine is full
item.tcc.chamber_prime.effect: Increases %1$s%% damage when using a full magazine sniper rifle. Cannot be equipped with Chamber simultaneously
item.tcc.core_fusion.desc: Core material obtained by burning curios in a furnace
item.tcc.rift_silver.effect: Right-click to randomly obtain a curio
item.tcc.overloaded_magazine.desc: Magazine with larger capacity but slower reloading
item.tcc.overloaded_magazine.effect: Increases %1$s%% shotgun magazine capacity, reduces reload speed by %2$s%%
item.tcc.infernal_chamber.desc: Technology that splits a single bullet into multiple bullets
item.tcc.infected_magazine.desc: Magazine with larger capacity but slower reloading
item.tcc.infected_magazine.effect: Increases %1$s%% pistol magazine capacity, reduces reload speed by %2$s%%
item.tcc.deadly_surge.desc: Lethal combination of high fire rate and multiple bullets
item.tcc.deadly_surge.effect: Increases %1$s%% pistol fire rate, increases %2$s%% bullet count
item.tcc.bullet_spread.desc: Technology that splits a single bullet into multiple bullets
item.tcc.oppression_point.desc: Mysterious curio that enhances melee attack power
item.tcc.oppression_point_prime.desc: Mysterious curio that extremely enhances melee attack power
item.tcc.sword_wind.desc: Mysterious curio that expands melee attack range
item.tcc.sword_wind_prime.desc: Mysterious curio that extremely expands melee attack range
item.tcc.depleted_reload.desc: Reduced magazine capacity, increased reload speed
item.tcc.depleted_reload.effect: Reduces %1$s%% magazine capacity, increases %2$s%% reload speed
item.tcc.burst_reload_prime.effect: Increases %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher reload speed
item.tcc.magazine_boost_prime.effect: Increases %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher magazine capacity
item.tcc.shotgun_expansion.desc: Efficient solution to increase magazine capacity
item.tcc.magazine_boost_new.desc: Efficient solution to increase magazine capacity
item.tcc.magazine_boost_new.effect: Increases %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher magazine capacity
item.tcc.tandem_magazine.desc: Efficient solution to increase magazine capacity
